nextSteps.heading: What's next?

confirm.title: Confirm Your Application
confirm.description: Click the "Check Status" button to confirm your application.

documents.title: Submit All Required Documents
documents.description: Please submit all required documents as specified in your application.

processing.title: Processing Begins After Payment Confirmation
processing.description: We will begin processing your evaluation once payment is confirmed.

nextSteps.contact: If you have any questions, please reply to your Application Confirmation Email thread. We look forward to cooperating with you!

upload.title: Upload Documents to {office} Office
upload.description: You can upload additional documents related to your application:
upload.infoDescription: Foreign Credential Evaluation is a service that assesses educational backgrounds and qualifications obtained outside the United States. It is crucial for foreign nationals seeking work authorization (H1B), immigration status, employment, education, or military recruitment in the U.S.

payment.title: Payment
payment.pendingNotice: Payment is not available until the due amount is set by our staff.

selectedServices.title: Selected Services
selectedServices.priceOnRequest: Price Will Be Quoted Upon Request
selectedServices.dueNotSet: Due amount is not set yet
selectedServices.footnote: * This fee applies to most applications but it may vary for some applicants. We will reconfirm your service details during the evaluation process. If any adjustments are needed, we will contact youâ€”any overpayment will be refunded, and underpayment will be collected. Thank you for your trust!

paymentCountdown.expiredDescription: Your payment deadline has expired. You may <link>contact support</link> to reactivate your application.
paymentCountdown.requiredDescription: Please complete your payment to proceed with application processing. Your application will expire if payment is not received in time.

footer.copyright: Copyright 2009 - Present American Education and Translation Services

degreeEquivalency.title: Degree Equivalency
degreeEquivalency.subtitle: See What Your Degree is Equivalent to in the U.S.
degreeEquivalency.description: Use our tool to learn more about what your degree is comparable to in the U.S.
degreeEquivalency.disclaimer: Not all degrees and institutions may be available.

aiAssistant.title: AI Assistant
aiAssistant.description: Chat with our AI assistant for help with your questions

checkStatus.title: Check Status
checkStatus.description: Track the progress of your submitted application

meta.title: American Education and Translation Services (AET) | Since 2009
meta.description: Located in Miami, Boston, SF, LA, NYC, American Education and Translation Services has been dedicated to being your best agency for Certified Translations and Credential Evaluation since 2009. Click to learn more.
meta.keywords: certified translation, notarized translation, foreign credential evaluation, translation services

metadata.title: Credential Evaluation Application | AET Service Application
metadata.description: AET Service Application for Credential Evaluation

paidCard.title: Here is Your AET Degree Equivalency
paidCard.description: Now that you know what your education is worth in the U.S., get an AET credential evaluation to verify your credentials so they will be recognized by U.S. universities, employers, and licensing boards. Follow these simple steps:

steps.step1: Begin Your Credential Evaluation Application Now.
steps.step3: AET prepares a credential evaluation and securely stores your documents. Your report never expires.

unpaidCard.title: Your AET Degree Equivalency is being processed.

uploader.title: Diploma Uploader
uploader.description: Uploading a clear screenshot or scan of your diploma or related documents helps improve the accuracy of our pre-evaluation. Please submit legible files for the best results.

note.label: Note
note.message: Any degree equivalency shown is based on the information you provided. It is not derived from verified documents and cannot be used as proof of attendance or degree completion. AET may update this provisional result after document verification and analysis.

paymentOverlay.title: Unlock Your U.S. Degree Equivalency Result

incomplete.title: Please Complete Current Step
incomplete.description: Please fill in all required fields

success.title: ðŸŽ‰ Degree Equivalency Application Submitted Successfully! ðŸŽ‰
success.description: Your application has been successfully submitted.

error.title: Degree Equivalency Submission Failed
error.description: There was an error submitting your application. Please try again later.

reset.title: Form Reset
reset.description: You can start filling out the application again

terms.label: I have read and agree to <link>AET's Terms of Service</link>

dialog.title: Are you sure you want to reset the application?
dialog.description: This action will clear all filled information, and you will need to start filling out the application again. This action cannot be undone.

clientInfo.title: Client Information

degreeObtained.label: Degree Obtained
degreeObtained.description: Please specify your degree in detail, including your major if applicable. For example: "Bachelor of Science in Computer Science"
degreeObtained.placeholder: e.g.: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

educationFields.englishHint: Please enter this information in English characters.

errors.serviceRequired: Please select at least one service

notes.rush: * Payment and documents must be received by 1:00pm EST.

reportDelivery.title: How Would You Like to Receive Your Report?

review.note: Please review all information carefully. We will process your application as soon as possible after submission.
